title: A Very English Christmas
description: alternate cover edition of ISBN 9781988260112A sexy and sweet ex-Amish holiday romanceLiving in the “English” outside world, Isaac and David have left behind the rigid, isolated Amish community where they first discovered their forbidden love. In San Francisco, they yearn for a home—and new bed—of their very own.As they experience Santa Claus and the bright lights and merry carols of modern Christmas for the first time, can they make their secret holiday wishes come true?A Very English Christmas by Keira Andrews is a short story and book 3.5 in the Gay Amish Romance Series. This Christmas gay romance features found family, sexual exploration, creative use of mistletoe, and of course a happy ending.
author: Keira Andrews
